content.value:
The full postmortem of the Google outage this week is now up:

- incomplete migrations can be dangerous
- it continues to baffle me that Google systems aren’t designed to minimize the blast radius.
- Automated tools shouldn’t have the ability to make *global* config changes.
content.html: The full postmortem of the Google outage this week is now up: - incomplete migrations can be dangerous - it continues to baffle me that Google systems aren’t designed to minimize the blast radius. - Automated tools shouldn’t have the ability to make *global* config changes.
